name.en: Seminar on Theory and Practice of Initiative and Referendum
name.ch: 公民投票之理論與實務專題研究

department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 歷經2018年十案綁公投的震撼，2021年公投遇到新冠肺炎攪局，最後公投以政黨對決收場。這個專題藉由研讀作者專書「公投法與政治」、2022年修憲複決公投，以及最近公投議題，分析公投法的理論結構與實務挑戰。
goal.en: After the shock of 10 referendum tied to nine-in-one elections in 2018, the 2021 referendum was disrupted by the Covid-19, and the final referendum 2021 ended in a political party showdown. This seminar analyzes the theoretical structure and practical challenges of the referendum law by studying the author‘s book “ Law and Politics of Referendum “, the 2022 constitutional amendment referendum, and recent referendum issues.

textbook.ch:
1、陳英鈐，公投法與政治，2021.
2、Dane Waters, The Initiative and Referendum Almanac, 2 Ed., A Comprehensive Reference Guide to the Initiative and Referendum Process in the United States, 2018
3. Henry S. Noyes, The Law of Direct Democracy, 2014.
4. In-Chin Chen, Law and Politics of Popular Vote in Taiwan, in: Forschung als Handlungs- und Kommunikationszusammenhang: Beiträge zur Verarbeitung gesellschaftlichen Wandels im Recht, Tübingen 2023, Mohr Siebeck, 413-429.
5. In-Chin Chen, Digital Democracy in Taiwan, 2023 upcomming.
textbook.en:
1、In-Chin Chen, Law and Politics of Referendum, 2021.
2、Dane Waters, The Initiative and Referendum Almanac, 2 Ed., A Comprehensive Reference Guide to the Initiative and Referendum Process in the United States, 2018
3. Henry S. Noyes, The Law of Direct Democracy, 2014.
4. In-Chin Chen, Law and Politics of Popular Vote in Taiwan, in: Forschung als Handlungs- und Kommunikationszusammenhang: Beiträge zur Verarbeitung gesellschaftlichen Wandels im Recht, Tübingen 2023, Mohr Siebeck, 413-429.

gradMethod.ch: 上課對參考文獻分析與報告佔學期成績百分之七十，參與其他同學分析討論佔學期成績百分之三十。
gradMethod.en: The analysis and report of references in class accounts for 70％ of the semester grade, and participating in other students‘ analysis and discussion accounts for 30％ of the semester grade.

officeHour.ch: 星期二上午九點到十二點、下午兩點到四點
officeHour.en: Tuesday 9:00 am to 12:00 pm, 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm

flexDiscription.ch: 在職專班注重理論與實務的結合，最後兩週彈性應用
flexDiscription.en: On-the-job special classes focus on the combination of theory and practice, with flexible application in the last two weeks
